content.question: Which of the following best describes a significance of spirituals such as “Steal Away to Jesus”?

choices.label: They represent a blending of Christian and Islamic ideas to encourage resistance to slavery.
They reflect a combination of music and faith to express the hardships and hopes of enslaved people.
They serve to secretly teach literacy to enslaved people through the use of song lyrics.
They recount the memories and experiences of enslaved Africans transported to Brazil.

content.answer: They reflect a combination of music and faith to express the hardships and hopes of enslaved people.
